cause.description:
already, philda has been attracting attention from many members of society. Fellow students, teachers and the best punters have already taken a liking to the horse that has become a cult figure and we are still waiting for him to reach his full potential. Demonstrate your support and help Philda to win a group one! If you do, drinks will be on the boys of the CRC when we claim group one glory!
1. must win a maiden first
2. then into a group one!
3. brreewwsssssssss
cause.mission: turn philda from below par into a racetrack SUPERSTAR!
cause.name: Help Philda win a Group 1!
